bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with da pu shang sun 打撲傷損. Ben cao yan yi 本草衍義 Substance Entry zi ran tong 自然銅： 今人打撲損，研極細，水飛過，同當歸、沒藥各半錢，以酒調，頻服， 仍以手摩痛處 , “For persons today with injuries from blows , grind extemely fine, conduct a water dispersion process to collect the finest particles floating on the surface. Then mix in wine with half a qian each of dang gui and mo yao , and ingest this repeatedly. Also, rub the aching locations with the hands”.
